JOB DESCRIPTION: We are hiring programmers for web and mobile apps development who have sound programming skills and optimistic in nature.Candidates with certifications or previous experience in a domain they are applying for will be considered first.Freshers can also apply.For Freshers, - there will be a training period of 6 months, - stipend amount of 5K will be given stating from the 4th month,- no stipend for the first 3 months in training,- salary will be decided based on performance after 6 months, typically it will range from 12K to 15K,Job Location: Sector 62, NoidaJob Responsibility:-> To learn the new technology and share the knowledge in the Team-> Analyze the requirement and develop software accordingly.-> TeamworkYour Qualification:-> Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science-> Should know English and good in Communication-> Positive attitude and should be ready to learn new thingsAbout Us:We are a mobile and web apps development company primarily dedicated to Android and iOS platforms and now growing into the web domain. Having a portfolio of more than 70 apps and great testimonials from our clients, we are looking to expand our team.At Wiselysoft, we always value your efforts and contribution to the company and we'd love to work as a team.

EDUCATION.UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Graduation Not Required
EDUCATION.PG: Post Graduation Not Required, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
EDUCATION.DOCTORATE: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
